info.title: UISP API
info.description:
You can authorize calls with x-auth-token by clicking the button on the right.
    You can get this token on endpoint /user/login

origin.description: Generated by UISP or manually added

clients.description: Number of clients of a device

cloudDeviceToken.description: Device token is a string uniquely identifying a device

compatible.description: If firmware is compatible with UISP

latestOnCurrentMajorVersion.description: Latest known firmware version on current major version

latestOver.description:
Upgrade this firmware version as first if target
  firmware is higher than latestOver. (AirCube must be updated over 2.8.0 fw)

upgradeRecommendedToVersion.description: Recommended firmware version to upgrade to.

prospective.description: Latest firmware version, even if not supported by UISP yet

frequencyBands.description: List of frequency bands in [key(freq),value(anze)] format.

cableLength.description: Cable Length from eth0 interface in meters. When below values is null cable is long less then 20m.

cableSnr.description: Average signal-to-noise ratio on eth0 interface in dB

rxCinr.description: Carrier to Interference-plus-Noise Ratio in dB on wireless

frequencyBands1.description: List of frequency bands in [key(freq),value(anze)] format.

enum: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunh
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

dyingGasp.description: Set to true if ONU is disconnected due to power outage

signalLevel.description: Signal level from 0 (no signal) to 4 (very strong signal). Null when unknown. Applicable for UISP-LTE and UISP-P-Pro with USB LTE Dongle

signalStrength.description: Actual signal strength in dBm. Null when unknown.

regStatus.description: Actual registration status of mobile network

parentId.description: Parent device id, applicable for ONU devices

pinAttemptsRemaining.description: Number of remaining allowed attempts to set or change PIN

isUdapiSpeedTestSupported.description: If device supports speed test over UDAPI.

isSupportRouter.description: The device can be configured to act as a network router.

compatible.description: If firmware is compatible with UISP

latestOnCurrentMajorVersion.description: Latest known firmware version on current major version

latestOver.description:
Upgrade this firmware version as first if target
  firmware is higher than latestOver. (AirCube must be updated over 2.8.0 fw)

upgradeRecommendedToVersion.description: Recommended firmware version to upgrade to.

prospective.description: Latest firmware version, even if not supported by UISP yet

displayName.description: UISP device alias or real name.

subsystemId.description: Device subsystem ID in string format.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UISP Fiber OLT.

items.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

customIpAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

maxChargingPower.description: Power reserved for charging in W.

batteryCapacity.description: Battery capacity in percentage (only for battery).

batteryTime.description: Battery remaining time in seconds (only for battery).

batteryType.description: Battery type from UDAPI (lead-acid or li-ion).

batteryCapacityConfigured.description: Configured battery capacity in mAh (only for battery).

batteryCapacityEstimated.description: Estimated battery capacity in mAh, null when the capacity is not known yet (only for battery).

outputPowers.description: Power consumption of each output port in W.

wirelessActiveInterfaceIds.description: Main active radios currently used to send/receive traffic.

Main lan interface speed.description: Available speed of main lan interface

batteryTime.description: Device remaining time in seconds when running on battery (batteries).

canUpgrade.description: TRUE if device can be upgraded.

distance.description: Nullable property in meters.Either distance between sites or distance returned from device AP.

frequency.description: Nullable prop; current frequency (only for airmax devices).

isLocateRunning.description: TRUE if device is in locate mode.

lastSeen.description: Last seen timestamp in ISO format.

maximalPower.description: Maximum power the device can currently provide in W.

runningOnBattery.description: TRUE if device is running on battery

signal.description: Nullable prop; current signal level (only for airmax devices), for example -55 dBm.

stationsCount.description: Count of stations (only for airmax and aircube).

linkStationsCount.description: Count of stations monitoring in this link (only for airMax, airFiber, Wave and aircube).

linkActiveStationsCount.description: Count of active stations (only for airMax, airFiber, Wave and aircube).

heading.description:
Value in degrees. The value is based on map, e.g. without magnetic declination.
    Ignored on udpate when magneticHeading is present. North is 0 degrees, East is 90, South is 180, West is 270.

magneticHeading.description:
Value in degrees. Compass heading (magnetic north).
    Its what youre changing when you spin the dish around on a mast.
    North is 0 degrees, East is 90, South is 180, West is 270.

displayName.description: Computed display name from name and description

address.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

port.description: Properties specific for ports on ES and TS devices.

frequency.description: Frequency in MHz, on which radio is listening.

channelWidth.description: Channel width in MHz radio is operating on.

dlRatio.description: Downlink ratio in percentage. To calculate Uplink percentage substract DlRatio out of a hundered.

displayName.description: UISP device alias or real name.

subsystemId.description: Device subsystem ID in string format.

ip.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

modelName.description: Full names, for example UISP Fiber OLT.

rxChain.description: Wireless signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

rxChainIdeal.description: Wireless ideal signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

txChain.description: Wireless signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

txChainIdeal.description: Wireless ideal signal level in dBm for each antenna chain.

compatible.description: If firmware is compatible with UISP

latestOnCurrentMajorVersion.description: Latest known firmware version on current major version

latestOver.description:
Upgrade this firmware version as first if target
  firmware is higher than latestOver. (AirCube must be updated over 2.8.0 fw)

upgradeRecommendedToVersion.description: Recommended firmware version to upgrade to.

prospective.description: Latest firmware version, even if not supported by UISP yet

ipAddress.description: Custom IP address in IPv4 or IPv6 format.

heading.description:
Value in degrees. The value is based on map, e.g. without magnetic declination.
    Ignored on update when magneticHeading is present. North is 0 degrees, East is 90, South is 180, West is 270.

magneticHeading.description:
Value in degrees. Compass heading (magnetic north).
    Its what youre changing when you spin the dish around on a mast.
    North is 0 degrees, East is 90, South is 180, West is 270.

tilt.description:
Value in degrees. How high in the sky the dish is pointing.
    0 degrees has the dish pointing straight ahead, 90 has the dish pointing straight up
    and -90 has the dish pointing straight down.

roll.description:
Value in degrees. How low one side of the dish is compared to the other.
    0 degrees no rotation, 90 rotation to the left, -90 rotation to the right and -180 upside down.
